headline: Should You Add PGR Stock to Your Portfolio Ahead of Q1 Earnings?
summary: Progressive's first-quarter results are likely to benefit from improved rates, solid policies in force and higher retention in its Vehicle & Property businesses.

headline: Progressive Stock Revisits A Buy Zone As Earnings Loom
summary: Progressive stock bounced back after a steep drop and is in a buy zone. The insurance company reports Q1earnings on Wednesday.

raw.headline: Progressive Stock Revisits A Buy Zone As Earnings Loom
